content: rocking around day 7 / 24 the christmas tree abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet difficulty slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase time 15 min material jute hook 3 5 mm written pattern tree row 1 chain 2 turn row 2 skip one chain single_crochet chain turn 1 total row 3 increase chain turn 2 total row 4 increase single_crochet 1 chain turn 3 total row 5 increase single_crochet 2 chain turn 4 total row 6 increase single_crochet 3 chain turn 5 total row 7 increase single_crochet 4 chain turn 6 total row 8 increase single_crochet 5 chain turn 7 total row 9 increase single_crochet 6 chain turn 8 total row 10 increase single_crochet 7 chain 9 total turn to the side of the tree and slip_stitch around the sides of the triangle one slip_stitch per one row chain at the top slip_stitch 9 slip_stitch chain slip_stitch on the top slip_stitch 9 cut the yarn and weave the ends in tree trunk row 1 attach the yarn at the 4th stitch of the bottom right side facing up single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet in next stitch x 2 chain turn 3 total row 2 single_crochet 3 chain turn 3 total row 3 slip_stitch 3 chain 3 total cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the christmas tree congratulations you finished the 7th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 17 to go
